reviews.review_msg: He's difinitely a good TA n knows what he's talking about! Also he's really cute!!

He really helped me learn about the subject. I thought I would be lingering in the library, studying until my soul gave out but going to Bryans office hours helped me a lot. He has an intangible quality about him, he taught me the virtue of creating an effective study plan. When my thoughts were seized up he helped me lessen the duress I was under,
